entry.name: notEqual

argument.name: message
argument.desc: A short description of the assertion

entry.desc: A comparison assertion, equivalent to JUnit/CommonJS assertNotEqual(s).

longdesc.p: The notEqual assertion uses the simple comparison operator (==) to compare the actual and expected arguments. When they are not equal, the assertion passes; otherwise, it fails. When it fails, both actual and expected values are displayed in the test result, in addition to a given message
